name: Monster+Connect!
description:
Monster+Connect! is a dating sim/adventure game. After the monster and human dimensions collide, a monster embarks on a journey to find her human soulmate. The game was made for the Ludum Dare 30 (Connected Worlds) jam competition and features music by Li'l Magic. The post-compo version includes a fully-customized GUI, sprite and background animations, godawful beeping noises, and a few other things we didn't have time to add during the jam.

Features

  • Dual command windows, allowing player to control both characters simultaneously
  • Goofy-looking monsters
  • Adventure-game exploration and mechanics
  • A glimpse into saguaro's coffee-addled mind
  • Unarchived source code
